name: Community Garden
description: A VR city powered Improbable's SpatialOS.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: i5 Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: Nvidia 1060 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 350 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: i7 Memory: 2048 MB RAM Graphics: Nvidia 1070 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 500 MB available space
